website_summaries.verdict: A good replacement tire option that is designed for fuel efficiency improvement on the road.
pros: Central grooves in the tread help improve overall highway and road performance
All-weather design uses a durable rubber that lasts for many thousands of miles
Easy to put on to most trailer rims in a pinch
cons: Thin rubber makes the tire susceptible to flats on the road

customer_reviews.title: Truth in answers would have been nice.
customer_reviews.text: I asked about the number of actual plies, not the rating. Response said 8 plies. Ordered the tires based on the response. Tires arrived and they are marked as only 5 ply on the tread area and 2 plies on the sidewall. They may have an 8 ply "rating", but not the actual real number of plies. Hope they work and don't blow out! Truth in answers would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Harriger

customer_reviews.title: 6 day old blowout
customer_reviews.text: this tire made it 6 days before it blew out in 7 places!! trailer isnt even close to max weight and the tire wasnt abused in any way whatsoever!! Super irritating!!
customer_reviews.author: JEM0320

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Good load capacity.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT price for my utility trailer. Pulled the wheels off, took to Wal-Mart, had mounted and balanced for reasonable cost. My trailer ready to sit idle and dry rot again as I get older.!! Woohoo...Winning!!
customer_reviews.author: TX Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I know this is a highly rated tire, but I thought I would add my bit as well. I have had these tires on a 6x10 single axle trailer for nearly 4 years and about 12000 miles. I haul a motorcycle, so the whole thing weighs about 2000 lbs loaded. Very happy with the wear, looks like I could get at least 5000 more out them. Can't beat that for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dtrux73

customer_reviews.title: It is a spare....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a spare for my trailer. It is a typical trailer tire. Made in China One warning: it is a bear to get mounted. I mounted it on a new rim and it took me 45 minutes, the bead setting tank, and a strap to get the bead set. The 2 made in the USA trailer tires I have on the trailer took me less then 10 minutes to mount both of them. If I would have known the amount of time and frustration this tire would have taken, I would have spent the extra $16 and got another USA made tire.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: Great by for 8-ply!
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy, I pull fast down the road. Cruised at 80-85mph all the way to North Carolina from Jacksonville Fl with a 20ft 1600lb trailer & a 4000lb 72 Impala strapped down. Note: Temps was High 60’s in Fl/Ga, 40’s in the Carolina’s. So not much road heat at those speeds. If it was Mid-Summer I would cruised at 68-72mph do to hot road temps could likely cause a blow-out. So keep that in mind while pulling. If your inexperienced at towing I do not recommend towing at those high speeds. Compensating Stop time nearly triples if your trailer doesn’t have a brake system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These tires look fantastic and pulled well on my 1500 mile round trip vacation with my ~1500 lb utility trailer. The date of manufacture was within the last 6 months. Incredible value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chad tobler

customer_reviews.title: 5000 miles and these were perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We installed these on our 27ft travel trailer. Just got back from a 2 week trip to Yellowstone. Over 5,000 miles and these were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: music

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: A lot of reviews complain about mounting issues and old tires. Just got mine and they were manufactured 6 months ago. Nothing wrong with that at all. I also mounted myself, if you do it on a tire mounting machine it’s easy as any other tire. Took me about 6-7 minutes a piece to dismount old tires, remove old valve stem, install new stem, and mount new tire. Bead sealed just fine. Don’t know why others have a hard time. Operator error imo. For durability I can’t comment yet. Only went about 5 miles so far. I mounted 4 of these on my 20’ tandem axle landscape trailer.
customer_reviews.author: josh schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great trailer spare
customer_reviews.text: Older rim used for spare trailer tire. Be sure to upgrade to a metal valve stem, plastic rots and breaks off over time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good TIres
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking smooth riding Tires. Haven't used the trailer much, purchased March of 2018. Of note, however, priced $6 more than when I purchased. 5 star if not for fore-mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lassalle

customer_reviews.title: Three stars to start
customer_reviews.text: I needed a spare for my boat. These were cheaper than the Freestar tires that I have on the boat trailer now so I figured I'd give them a shot. Hopefully, I never need to use this one.
customer_reviews.author: bakerjw

customer_reviews.title: Good value, perfect replacement size.
customer_reviews.text: These tires are still pretty new, with fairly low mileage. I bought tire covers to protect from the Arizona sun. Too new to review actual durability that's why I only gave a three star rate.
customer_reviews.author: S.  Math

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great price
customer_reviews.text: Just put a 1575 mile trip on a set of 4 and had absolutely on problems. When mounted, not one tire used more than 2 ozs of weight. Great deal, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Husband said need to replace a tire so order this one and it was the same as what was on the trailer already so I know it should last and preform as it is meant too. Easy to replace and now we have it for a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price untouched
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality , drove them 470 miles rides great. Radical tires are the way to go. Pricing below retail outlet stores
customer_reviews.author: johnny boy

customer_reviews.title: ease going
customer_reviews.text: The tire went on to the rim real ease it was done by hand and aired up just fine now it sets on the rear of my trailer as the spare tire, it looks real nice.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: I placed these in my 5X10 open trailer. So far so good. I haven’t had any issues. I also haven’t used the trailer for a heavy load. Tired were placed on the rim by my local tire shop. Tires seem good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. All my research says this the best toyhauler tire but they due wear fast. Keep the air pressure up.
customer_reviews.author: John In HB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: Had a worn out tire on my trailer due to axle issues and just needed one tire. This is a great price and got here quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The right weight classification to your use.
customer_reviews.text: The price was okay. Looked to be a good quality Tire. Only have 3500 miles on this tire so far and it's looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Jahn

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Excellent tire
customer_reviews.text: Tire came on a rim!!! Although wro g for my trailet...Great tire and half the price of tires elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: TexasRancher

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great trailer tires, been running almost daily on cargo trailer. Got good tread after around 12k miles
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Most bang for your dollar!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for weeks until I stumbled across these--- Great deal!! You can not go wrong with these tires.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh B Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Good tire, and worth the money. Much better than what the new trailet came with.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B.

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: Got these tires quickly and had them mounted. But it will be months or years based upon my trailer use before I will be able to comment on their competency to do the job. But at first look, they look to be a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Cycledan

customer_reviews.title: Just installed them and came back from a 1300 mile ...
customer_reviews.text: Just installed them and came back from a 1300 mile round trip towing a open car hauler. No noise, tracks straight, took minimal wheel weights. I'll buy more for my spares.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Rubber
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good tire! It’s round and it’s black. That’s all I care about
customer_reviews.author: Kendogbassin

customer_reviews.title: Good Trailer Tire
customer_reviews.text: I've had them on a trailer that hauls the tractor for almost two years. I've had zero issues with them. No dry rotting. Thinking about buying another set for another trailer.
customer_reviews.author: W L

customer_reviews.title: Looks a lot like tire I paid more than double for
customer_reviews.text: Looks a lot like tire I paid more than double for. Seems to be good tire for the price, might would’ve given 5 star rating, but waiting to see how they last. Happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Decent tire for less than Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Best price for a reasonably rated trailer tire. Has been working well for a while with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: These are a great deal
customer_reviews.text: These tire are a great tell. Solid and pretty quite for a bit more aggressive tire.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the money. Well built.
customer_reviews.text: I have them on the trailer now. Have not pulled it anywhere yetbut the ties are very well made. Only took 0.50oz. At the heaviest to balance them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua hiegert

customer_reviews.title: Save me money.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and I'm glad I order them this way.
customer_reviews.author: wayne Stafford

customer_reviews.title: I'll know more after they have more miles on them
customer_reviews.text: It's a trailer tire so it's too soon for me to know what kind of service I'm going to get out of it. The tire shop had no issues with mounting them and they were reasonably balanced. The first trip no issues. The time to review this would be maybe a year from now. They were reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J.

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to mount
customer_reviews.text: Decent tires for a trailer. 3 of 4 were smashed in side walls which made it difficult to seat the bead without professional tools.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Howard Mainprize

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires and delivery service at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced both tires on my trailer after an old one failed and I could not find a local dealer stocking radials for trailers. These tires are appear to be an excellent replacement for the original radials on my 6x12 single axle enclosed trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: They are round, black and cheap. Don’t know about how they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma

customer_reviews.title: NOT 8-ply tires!
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT 8-ply tires. 2 ply polyester, 2 ply steel, 1 ply nylon. Sidewall 2 ply polyester. May not be the sharpest knife in the drawer but that equals 7. They will work for now because I have no other choice. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Holds air, Balances fine, Runs smooth
customer_reviews.text: The Trailer King ST Radial tire runs smooth and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Come exactly as described. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Great quality. Bought these for the trailer at my church. They were excited to have good tires on the trailer again. They came exactly as advertised. Fit right on the trailer with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Replacement tire for utility trailer. Easier and cheaper than going to Walmart. Have bought before and am satisfied with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve ordered these in the past and we’re so pleased, we ordered more for another trailer. Great service, nice tire, super price!
customer_reviews.author: chintzfan

customer_reviews.title: Inexpesive
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be sturdy. I am using it as a spare so I can't rate all aspects of this tire
customer_reviews.author: James Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Hard to seat
customer_reviews.text: Its a cheap tire. If you’ve ever mounted cheap tires you’ll know what I mean. Hard to seat the bead.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent valve for the $$$ money.
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for my 2002 ranger that I am rebuilding. Have had them on for over a year and getting excellent wear. Also very little road noise. Will buy these again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ray D

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my landscape trailer. So far no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Glen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed in these tires
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in these tires, I had a blowout in less than a year and of course no road hazard because I bought them online through amazon. I now have to buy another to replace this, because I don't want to buy 4 new tires of another brand. Trailer King is supposed to be superior strength and extreme durability, but I disagree.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF POWELL

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Pic shows a rim. Doesn't come with a rim & I found one with for the same price
customer_reviews.author: A. Cilluffo

customer_reviews.title: Great tires -
customer_reviews.text: Great tires - just came back from a 1,500 mile trip with a new set on a 1,200# GVW trailer, fully loaded and they did perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Replaced all of my trailer tires. Great price, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good tire reasonable price received wrong tire but company very vigilant about correcting issue very impressed with timely response to correcting issue
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good looking tire. I use it as a spare on my Jeep Wrangler.
customer_reviews.author: geoff

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Already blew a tire that was just bought in June. Not happy with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schillinger

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Been running on my fifth wheel camp trailer. Works great so far! Just as described. Load D radial and even shipped free to me in Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: Actionjacksonak

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for about 500 miles but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: sean weiland

customer_reviews.title: Great spare trailer tire
customer_reviews.text: Great Radial tire for the price, using it for my spare tire for my 5x8 cargo trailer
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: had these tires for a year and still look new. Great tire!
customer_reviews.text: nice looking tire, solid construction and smooth on the highway. i would recomend these tires and for the price they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Not load range D
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these tires because hey are listed as load range D, the tires i received are load range C.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up for my car hauler. Great price and very fast shipping. Trailer pulls so much better now with these new tires.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: Saved significant money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, as advertised. I had to call around to get a reasonable quote for a tire shop to mount them on the rims. Les schwabb wanted 40 per tire. What a rip off
customer_reviews.author: christopher p.

customer_reviews.title: Tough Tire
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. Seems to hold up well under heavy loads
customer_reviews.author: WoodySawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires that seem to ride well. Great price and easy installation. Appear to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B Garner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good shape and fit very good in my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: `ALEJANDRO

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: All four tires nice and round and very little weight needed to balance. Just completed 500 mi trip close to max capacity with no problems or vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Elowsky

customer_reviews.title: Good & fast
customer_reviews.text: They look good on my trailer. Haven't taken out on the road, But I am sure they will ride nicely.
customer_reviews.author: robert v.

customer_reviews.title: Great tirea for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good quality for the price. I have a few thousand miles on these now towing vehicles on a tandem axle trailer and they've done great! I even had them either maxed out or slightly overloaded on one trip for about 400 miles with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and exactly what I expected in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Really needed fast, came earlier than ecpected. Performed well on return trip.
customer_reviews.author: JFR777

customer_reviews.title: 26 rv trailer jayco
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount well built tire ..500 miles so far no issues.... tracks good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huevos
customer_reviews.text: I’m a doing for this the free $3 gift card don’t feel specially
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Thin sidewalls
customer_reviews.text: Thin sidewalls for a trailer tire. Not expecting super life out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Aime Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value on these tires. I would order from here again.
customer_reviews.author: TERRI D JIMENEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Have 1500+ miles on them with no problems. Great price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Performing well.
customer_reviews.text: So far 500Mi on both Hwy and gravel and performing well.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires but I ordered 4 and only got 3 not sure what happened to the 4th tire
customer_reviews.author: Ali Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Came A-day earlier than what the tracking said it would. Great tire for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harper

customer_reviews.title: The valve, fast shipping and quality of the tire.
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are D rated tires at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: spare tire
customer_reviews.text: this deal sucks, it shows a rim and tire but there isn't a tire when you order
customer_reviews.author: Jerry crowley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: use them on our work trailer work great so far
customer_reviews.author: bas052

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Even the local used-tire dealer that installed them agreed. Tires were as described and were delivered faster than estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Justin James

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Good 8 ply tires that ride smooth and track straight. I especially liked the higher speed rating and smooth tread pattern for hwy driving. We bought six for our triple axle trailer for the price of three locally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tire!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an awesome trailer tire that provides long tire wear, then look no further. Price and value makes this tire the clear winner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TIRES LOOK GRATE
customer_reviews.text: R SHOP LOVE THE TIRES. WE LOVE TOWS AUTO TRANSPORT.
customer_reviews.author: WE LOVE TOWS AUTO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to tell how durable they will be but they look well constructed
customer_reviews.author: Phil S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking tire . will match the tiers i have now.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Schieffer

customer_reviews.title: Good tire, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tire for the money. I have three trailers and I have switched from Carlisles to these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great price, exact fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace original trailer tires, bias. Great price on this product that was well below any local price. This product was an exact fit, wear is much better with this radial tire than with the bias tire that came with the trailer. Will use this seller again. Fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Edward W Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Great quality 8 ply radial tire with 2149 lb load ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality 8 ply radial tire with 2149 lb load rating and 75 mph speed rating. Had them installed on existing rims and balanced for 15 bucks a tire at local wally world. You cant beat the price as compared to local trailer dealers!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G

customer_reviews.title: I have them on a 24 ft toy hauler and they seem to work great, trailer pulls good
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on or before time, had them installed by local tire shop, balanced well, I have them on a 24 ft toy hauler and they seem to work great, trailer pulls good, have not put to may miles on them yet but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Farrell K.

customer_reviews.title: Trailer King ST Radial for 12' Enclosed trailer
customer_reviews.text: Great looking tire, fit rim as expected, a slightly higher rated tire than the original.
customer_reviews.author: C SCHNEIDER

customer_reviews.title: Not better than biased ply.
customer_reviews.text: At 80 psi they bagged like flats, while the OEM bias ply 50psi stood like always. Shipped fast, course crap flows quick. Update 1\12\17 Three trips to LA from the panhandle of FL, same view as before. I do not believe these to be load range D tires. They buckle the side walls at 80 psi way more than the old bias with just 50psi in the bias tires. They have a Very soft side wall and this allows the trailer (7.5'x18') to sway a lot more than the original bias tires. Honestly I'm hoping they wear out soon so I can go back to the original bias tires. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Marie and  Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Received ahead of projected time commit. They are mounted and ready to go on the first trip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: trailer tire
customer_reviews.text: Tire worked good for use as a spare . I will likely buy two more once the original one's wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Meaden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a trailer tire. Exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: k_earl

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME tire
customer_reviews.text: These trailer tires are AWESOME and you cant beat the price! They are correctly made with 8-10 ply radial and made for trailer purpose. I bought 4 of these tires for my dual axle fishing boat trailer, that hauls my 24ft Radon boat (super heavy). They handle very well with no sag or unsafe feeling while towing. I have these mounted on 15x8 wheels. I should have these mounted on skinner wheels with a width of say 5/6/7 wide wheels. we had a hard time popping and seating the bead on a 15x8 but all good, we used a bazooka tire air gun to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Reyton S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires, mounted on trailer and towed from Oklahoma to Myrtle beach Sc. Tires tracked very well .
customer_reviews.author: Casey Avery

customer_reviews.title: All numbers match up, but they are smaller than they're supposed to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have a two horse trailer. Instead of replacing all four tires, I only replaced two. Even though all the number of the sizing match up, the tire is smaller! I have taking my trailer with my horse to multiple places and nothing has happened to the tire so far. I would give 2.5 stars if I can
customer_reviews.author: Breana Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire tracks nice would buy again. But get your big boy pants on when you mount them up it was not easy to do with good equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TIRES! I had them installed locally and the ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TIRES ! I had them installed locally and the company the installed them commented on what a great tire they were.
customer_reviews.author: PRIMITIV

product_meta.title: Trailer King ST Radial Trailer Tire - 205/75R15 107L
feature_bullets: Center groove for consistent tracking & stability
Enhanced shoulder design provides better heat dissipation resulting in longer tread life and even wear
Nylon overlay construction on all sizes for superior strength and extreme durability in higher load applications
